WTDIVISION.style: display:none; background:#d4d3d3; color:#000070; border:solid 1px #333; position:absolute; left:100px; top:100px; padding:10px; z-index:1

WTACTION.name: InitLabels
WTACTION.WTCUSTOM: If (xmlError = "") Then DoError 0, "", tmpCount & " Language Labels Initialized"

WTERROR.message: Oops, Please enter text to search for.

WTOBJECT.name: Questions
WTOBJECT.WTCUSTOM:
tmpSearchText = Trim(reqSearchText) If InStr(tmpSearchText, " " ) > 0 Then If InStr(tmpSearchText, chr(34) ) = 0 Then tmpSearchText = chr(34) + tmpSearchText + chr(34) End If
reqBookmark = .Search(reqBookmark, tmpSearchText, reqDirection, CLng(reqCompanyID), tmpSecurityLevel)
'Check for error for Noise Words only If Err.Number = -2147217900 Then Err.Number = 0 reqSearchText = "" End If If (Err.Number <> 0) Then DoError Err.Number, Err.Source, Err.Description End If

WTDIVISION.style: display:none; background:#d4d3d3; color:#000070; border:solid 1px #333; position:absolute; left:100px; top:100px; padding:10px; z-index:1

WTCOMBO.style: -webkit-appearance: none; -moz-appearance: none; border: 0 !important; color: #fff; -webkit-border-radius: 5px; border-radius: 5px; font-size: 14px; padding: 6px; width: 30%; cursor: pointer; background: #0d98e8 url('images/drop-down-arrow.png') no-repeat right center; background-size: 40px 37px;

WTERROR.message: Oops, Please enter text to search for.

WTOBJECT.name: Questions
WTOBJECT.WTCUSTOM:
tmpSearchText = SearchText(Trim(reqSearchText))
reqBookmark = .Search(reqBookmark, tmpSearchText, reqDirection, CLng(reqCompanyID), tmpSecurityLevel)
'Check for error for Noise Words only If Err.Number = -2147217900 Then Err.Number = 0 reqSearchText = "" End If If (Err.Number <> 0) Then DoError Err.Number, Err.Source, Err.Description End If
